Text:
An error appears: "The application has failed to start because its side-by-side configuration is incorrect"

I think this has smth to do with the C++ redist libraries. Can anyone provide a solution? Uninstalling & reinstalling C++ redist or manipulating compatibility options does not solve it
Did anyone solve the problem of the side-by-side configuration? I'me xperiencing it too.
After I start the setup and press run nothing happens..
Check Redist folder. Install components inside.

after installing all the redists still
see below..
Activation context generation failed for "E:PuddleLauncher.exe". Dependent Assembly Microsoft.VC90.CRT,processorArchitecture="x86",publicKeyToken="1fc8b3b9a1e18e3b",type="win32",version="9.0.30729.6161" could not be found. Please use sxstrace.exe for detailed diagnosis.

Error - "The application has failed to start because its side-by-side configuration is incorrect. Please see the application event log or use the command-line sxstrace.exe tool for more detail."

Installed everything from Redist folder, then to same error... any solutions??
getting the error "The application has failed to start because its side-by-side configuration is incorrect" what should i do ?

I was getting the "side-by-side configuration" error too.  The vcredist file that comes with the game doesn't seem to work properly.  It extracts the files, but never starts the installation.  I fixed the problem by installing the "vcredist_x86.exe" file found here:
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=26368
Yep Nessdude is right that did the trick =)

Getting a "XML Parsing error ...DocumentsPuddleSettings.dat' Error: File not found"

Anyone else getting this? I used the link above to fix my side-by-side error message, but now I get this one.
edit: there are supposed to be 'slashes' in that file name. "Documents - Puddle - Settings.dat"
edit edit: I was clicking on the "Puddle" application, you want to click on the "Launcher" application. My bad.
i was win 7 64bits but i need to install the redist 32x, then the game works perfect, like Nessdude says.
Run Set up as Admin then run  LAUNCHER you fucking twats!
Run as admin, then run LAUNCHER
